song.verse: I need Thee ev’ry ## hour most gracious Lord;## No tender voice like Thine ## can peace afford.
CHORUS : I need Thee, oh, I need Thee. ## Ev'ry hour I need Thee.## Oh, bless me now, my Saviour! ## I come to Thee.
I need Thee ev'ry hour, ## stay Thou near by;## Temptations lose their power ## when Thou art nigh.
I need Thee ev'ry hour,## in joy or in pain;## Come quickly and abide ## or life is vain.
I need Thee ev'ry hour, ## teach me Thy will;## And Thy rich promises ## in me fulfill.
I need Thee ev'ry hour, ## Most Holy One;## O make me Thine indeed, ## Thou blèssed Son.
